text:
Gonna have to say big thanks to <@U2H3TT8F2> for being kind and supportive with getting along with HubSpot development. Thanks to his kindness it is so welcoming here in the community :pray::orange_heart:
Special thank you for the corgi emoji :corgi-wave: :grin:
Aj is an alright guy, I guess :upside_down_face:
Thank you Olia for all the assistance you provide in the community and being an awesome person! Always happy to add Corgi anything to this slack :slightly_smiling_face:
I feel we cant discuss corgis without <@UBFA10FMF> as they would be all in on this convo!
